document.docAuthor: Marino De Remes Lenicov, Ana M., Maciá, Arnaldo & Pianzola, Bruno
document.masterDocTitle: Cicadidae types (Hemiptera-Cicadomorpha) housed at the Museo de La Plata entomological collection (Argentina)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Cicadidae types (Hemiptera-Cicadomorpha) housed at the Museo de La Plata entomological collection (Argentina)

mods:name.mods:namePart: Marino De Remes Lenicov, Ana M.

paragraph.bibRef:
1948
a.
Notas del Museo de La Plata
,
13
(
103
),
125–127
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Remarks. Holotype and allotype with left wings extended. Paratype male with fore right leg broken. The original publication also indicates a paratype male, Catamarca province, Queñoa Pelado, Rohmer leg. ( IML ), paratype female, Tucumán province, Tafí del Valle ( IML ) and two paratype females, from Salta ( MACN ).

paragraph.bibRef:
1879
.
Anales de la Sociedad Científica Argentina
8 , 212–213
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks. Specimen with left wings extended. This species was originally placed by Berg near
Carineta fasciculata Germ. It
holds six labels. The specimen labelled as “ typus ” by Berg, is considered here as holotype by monotypy ( ICZN , art. 73.2.1).

paragraph.bibRef:
1948
a.
Notas del Museo de La Plata
13
(
103
),
121–122
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Remarks. Allotype with left wings extended. The original publication indicates that the holotype female is from Misiones province, Puerto Bemberg, Hayward-Willink-Goldbach, col. ( IML ).

paragraph.bibRef:
1948
a.
Notas del Museo de La Plata
13
(
103
),
116–118
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Paratype , male ( 1 ) and females ( 2 ) MLP N° 1666 / 3-5 . Argentina , Catamarca, Las Mansas, Dto. Belen.

Remarks. Paratype male 1666 / 3 with left wings extended; female 1666 / 5 with left wings extended, right wings missing. The original publication also indicates an allotype female, paratypes males ( 2 ) and female ( 1 ), from Catamarca province, Las Mansas ( IML ).

paragraph.bibRef:
1948
a.
Notas del Museo de La Plata
13
(
103
),
114–116
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Remarks. Allotype with left wings extended and vial with genitalia dissected. The original publication also mentions the holotype male and paratypes males ( 4 ) from Tucumán province, Vallecito, Röhmer leg., and one female from Tucumán province, Villa Nougués, as well as other studied specimens: two males, one from Villa Nougués and the other without locality ( IML ).

paragraph.bibRef:
1948
a.
Notas del Museo de La Plata
13
(
103
),
122–124
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Remarks. The original publication indicates holotype male and allotype female from Jujuy province, Volcán, and also two females, without locality from Tucumán province ( IML ).

paragraph.bibRef:
1948
a.
Notas del Museo de La Plata
13
(
103
),
118–120
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Remarks. Holotype with left wings extended and without subgenital plate. The original publication indicates two paratypes : one male from Tucumán province, Villa Nougués and one female, Catamarca province, Dto. Belén ( IML ).
